snippet: Exports and consumer spending displayed signs of weakening after strong growth in the first half of the year, a government estimate on Thursday showed.
lead_paragraph: Exports and consumer spending displayed signs of weakening after strong growth in the first half of the year, a government estimate on Thursday showed.

headline.main: Slowdown in Japan Raises the Pressure on Abe
headline.print_headline: Slowdown in Japan Raises the Pressure on Abe
